Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Aussie news update! People have been talking about the National Cabinet meeting in Brisbane and the upcoming federal budget. The Medicare overhaul easing pressure on hospitals possible changes in visa rules for doctors in rural areas and investing in climate resilience in growing outer suburbs are among the topics for discussion. Meanwhile Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander legal sector is requesting emergency funding to keep up with growing demand. Stay informed and tuned in with ABC Radio for reliable news coverage.
